tool.name: Monocle3 diffExp

param.name: neighbor_graph
param.label: What neighbor graph to use, principal graph recommended for trajectory analysis.

param.name: reduction_method
param.label: The reduction method to base the analysis on.

param.name: knn
param.label: Number of nearest neighbors used for building the kNN graph which is passed to knn2nb function during the Moran's I (Geary's C) test procedure.

param.name: method
param.label: A character string specifying the method for detecting significant genes showing correlated expression along the principal graph embedded in the low dimensional space.

param.name: alternative
param.label: A character string specifying the alternative hypothesis.
